title: Microservices Social Platform
description: A scalable social media app built with microservices architecture. Separate services for user management, posts, and notifications, integrated with a CI/CD pipeline.
focusedOn: Microservices, Redis, Docker, RabbitMQ, Express, Node.js, MongoDB, CI/CD

title: E-commerce Platform
description: A complete e-commerce solution with user authentication, product catalog, cart, and payment integration. Built with MERN stack for seamless performance.
focusedOn: MERN Stack, Authentication, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI

title: Full Stack Web Solutions
description: A document management system developed during an internship. Features include secure file uploads, user roles, and search functionality for a companyâ€™s internal use.
focusedOn: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL, TailwindCSS, AWS EC2

title: Book Store Backend
description: A backend API for a bookstore with filtering and sorting features. Built with Node.js and MongoDB to manage books, categories, and user queries efficiently.
focusedOn: Node.js, MongoDB, REST API, Aggregation Pipeline

title: React Tailwind Music Player
description: A responsive music player UI built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS. Includes play/pause, track selection, and a sleek design for an enhanced user experience.

title: React Tailwind Image Gallery
description: A dynamic image gallery built with React and Tailwind CSS. Features Third Party JSON API Integration, lightbox view, and a modern grid layout for showcasing visuals.
